name: ddns-client
author: Wes Cruver <chieffancypants@gmail.com> (https://github.com/chieffancypants/)
description: Very simple Dynamic DNS (DDNS) client for node

scripts.clean: rm -rf build/ && rm -rf build/ && rm -f ddns-client.zip
scripts.ncc: npm exec ncc -- build index.ts -o build -a -s --license licenses.txt
scripts.zip: zip -r ddns-client.zip build/* README.md LICENSE scripts
scripts.prepackage: npm run lint && npx tsc --noEmit && npm run test && npm run clean
scripts.package: npm run ncc && npm run zip
